description:
Claudia La Salle is an American U.N. Spacy bridge officer in charge of weaponry and navigation of the http://anidb.net/ch21733 [SDF-1 Macross] space fortress. She and fellow bridge officer http://anidb.net/ch7652 [Hayase Misa] are close friends, and she is often there to give her friend advice on matters of the heart (especially when it comes to http://anidb.net/ch7652 [Misa]`s confused feelings for http://anidb.net/ch7654 [Ichijou Hikaru]), something http://anidb.net/ch7652 [Hayase] is awkward in. She used to be in a close relationship with http://anidb.net/ch10505 [Roy Focker] until his death.
She is known as Claudia Grant in Robotech. Claudia LaSalle does not die at the end of Macross, although her Robotech counterpart does die.It is possible Claudia is a relative of http://anidb.net/ch14116 [Edgar LaSalle] from http://anidb.net/a427 [Macross Zero], who was http://anidb.net/ch14110 [Kudou Shin]`s RIO.
Source: wiki
name: Claudia La Salle
